channel.title: In need of a hoster. [please read]
channel.description:
Hello, as you all can see, I'm in need of a hoster for my server. I'm only about half way through it, but I tested it today, and I got a couple people on it before I crashed myself. I really don't want my players being irritated, then leaving, so I've come to find a trustworthy hoster.
The name of my server is [b]Alcatraz[/b](please tell me if you've seen the name elsewhere), which is a jail based theme, which no one has ever used before. At least this "jail" I've never seen before on a server's base.
I can really compromise with people well, too. See, I'm only looking for around [b][i]10-12/5-7[/i][/b], so this should not be hard to find. I will get back to you with the exact size of my server. The hoster will be Administrator/Co-Owner on my(our) server && forums, which is a great reward.
If you would like to help me out hosting around [b]10-12/5-7[/b], please contact me on my msn at J.Brantz@hotmail.com . Please allow me time to get back to you and be patient, for I have am not on MSN at all times. I assure you I'll get back in touch with you, though.
Thanks in advance.
[i][ == Note == ][/i] [b]Don't even try to lie to just get after my source, I can sense when people are trustworthy from those who aren't.[/b]

D3ath and nub, both of you add my msn.

Read full topic

Hello, as you all can see, I’m in need of a hoster for my server. I’m only about half way through it, but I tested it today, and I got a couple people on it before I crashed myself. I really don’t want my players being irritated, then leaving, so I’ve come to find a trustworthy hoster.

The name of my server is Alcatraz(please tell me if you’ve seen the name elsewhere), which is a jail based theme, which no one has ever used before. At least this “jail” I’ve never seen before on a server’s base.
